ABOUT THE WORK:

  • Year Composed:
    2015
  • Instrumentation:
    2.2.2.1-1.2.0.0-Timp+1 Perc-6.5.4.3.2, 2 flutes, 2 oboes, clarinet, bass clarinet, bassoon, horn, trumpet, timpani, percussion, 1st violins, 2nd violins, violas, cellos, and contrabass
  • Share:

PROGRAM NOTES:

de/ter| |ior.ation was written in early March 2015 and is closely tied to my multimedia opera Hunger, exploring themes of psychological decay, irrationality, & self-destruction through fragmentation of musical objects, gestures, video, & obfuscation. […] These themes are manifest in the character of the musical materials themselves, navigating a spectrum between saturation & fragility. I imagine this almost as an estranged overture to the opera - existing separately, but remaining inextricably entwined…



Performances of de/ter| |ior.ation
